abstract: Lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, defendant in 2013 Boston Marathon bombing case, say they want the jury in his trial to view the entire boat in which he hid while the authorities searched for him several days after the bombing.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the defendant in the 2013 bombing of the Boston Marathon, said Monday that they wanted the jury in his trial to view the entire boat in which he hid while the authorities searched for him several days after the bombing.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Boat Is Subject of Sparring in Bombing Case
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Boat Is Subject of Sparring in Bombing Case

snippet: Lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the defendant in the 2013 bombing of the Boston Marathon, said Monday that they wanted the jury in his trial to view the entire boat in which he hid while the authorities searched for him several days after the bombing.
